dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 24, 2006 3:31 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; aaron@goldblatt.net
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Notice
Date: Tue, 24 Jan 2006 12:05:08 -0600
From: Aaron Goldblatt <aaron@goldblatt.net>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

This complaint is sent pursuant to applicable provisions of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.

Under penalty of perjury I certify that:

1)  I am authorized to make this complaint on behalf of the copyright owner.

2)  The copyrighted work in question is adult photography of a model(s) shot
by Abbywinters Pty Ltd. Any other photographs on your servers of the woman,
women, or couples in the listed URLs at the bottom of this notice are also
covered by this complaint.

3) The copyrighted work in question is available on Internet servers within
the IP address block of your Internet provider, as registered by the
American Registry of Internet Numbers (ARIN, http://www.arin.net/).

4) For purposes of this complaint, you may contact me, Aaron Goldblatt, at
copyright@abbywinters.com.  I may be contacted by United States postal mail
at 609 Pineview Lane, Fort Worth Texas, 76140.  I may be contacted by voice
telephone at 817-886-8943.  Email is the preferred method of communication.

5) I believe in good faith that the use of the material outlined in this
complaint is not authorized by Abbywinters Pty Ltd. (the copyright owner),
abbywinters.com (the site originally publishing these photographs), its
agents, or the law.

6) I believe that the information in this notification is accurate. I
certify that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive
right that is being infringed.

** PLEASE NOTE:  THE LISTED URLS ARE EXAMPLES ONLY.  THERE ARE POTENTIALLY
THOUSANDS OF INFRINGING MOVIES ON ZETMOVIES.COM.
ZETMOVIES.COM IS A DELIBERATELY DECEPTIVE "ENDLESS LINK" SITE THAT DRIVES
TRAFFIC TO A PAY SITE.  ALL IMAGES ON THE ZETMOVIES.COM SERVER THAT ARE
BRANDED "ABBYWINTERS.COM" ARE COVERED BY THIS NOTICE.

** PLEASE NOTE:  THIS IS NOT A FIRST OFFENSE.  ABBYWINTERS.COM HAS SENT
MULTIPLE DMCA NOTICES TO THEPLANET WITH RESPECT TO THIS CUSTOMER.
PLEASE MAKE THIS STOP FOREVER.

This document is signed electronically by Aaron Goldblatt.

Thank you,


Aaron Goldblatt

http://zetmovies.com/galls/7dfca7/01.jpg
http://zetmovies.com/galls/7dfca7/02.jpg
http://zetmovies.com/galls/7dfca7/03.jpg

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
